trans-unit.source: Represents the possible layout rendering options for the content of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control on a page.
trans-unit.target: 表示頁面上 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控制項內容的可能配置呈現選項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelRenderMode> enumeration defines which HTML elements to use to enclose the content of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelRenderMode>列舉會定義哪些 HTML 項目來括住的內容使用<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode%2A> property must be one of the values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelRenderMode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode%2A>屬性必須是其中一個值的<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelRenderMode>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The content of an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control can be rendered inside either an HTML `<div>` element or a `<span>` element.
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項可以呈現任何一個區塊的 HTML`<div>`項目或`<span>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode%2A> property value is Block.
The following example shows how to declaratively set the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode%2A> property of an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode%2A> control to Inline.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何以宣告方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode%2A>內嵌的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control contains a string that represents the number of postbacks from the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制項包含表示頁面的回傳數目的字串。

trans-unit.source: The contents are rendered inline with the surrounding text.
trans-unit.target: 內容的方式呈現內嵌於周圍的文字。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the content of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control is rendered inside an HTML <see langword="<div>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 指定要呈現在 HTML <see langword="<div>" /> 項目內部的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控制項內容。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the content of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control is rendered inside an HTML <see langword="<span>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 指定要呈現在 HTML <see langword="<span>" /> 項目內部的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控制項內容。
